headline: Will Gartner (IT) be Able to Reaccelerate Its Organic Growth?
summary: Oakmark Funds, advised by Harris Associates, released its “Oakmark Global Fund” fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. The fund’s objective is long-term capital appreciation by investing in a diverse group of U.S. and non-U.S. companies. The all-cap mandate of the fund allows it to invest across all market-cap companies. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In […]

headline: Does Gartner (IT) Offer Value After A 52.8% One Year Share Price Decline
summary: If you are wondering whether Gartner's share price still makes sense at current levels, this article will walk through what the market might be pricing in and what that could mean for you. Gartner closed at US$235.79, with returns of 3.7% decline over the last 7 days, 0.8% over 30 days, 0.5% decline year to date, 52.8% decline over 1 year, 29.4% decline over 3 years, and 47.9% over 5 years. Taken together, this gives a mixed picture of recent performance and risk perception. Recent coverage...

headline: Weaviate named a Leader and Outperformer by GigaOm and Emerging Leader by Gartner; Market Momentum Accelerates as Nonrelational DBMS Segment Grows 22.7%
summary: Rapid delivery of new features positions Weaviate at the forefront of a booming market driven by enterprise adoption of generative AI. Weaviate Weaviate Amsterdam City, Jan. 13, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Weaviate, the AI database company, today announced it has been recognized as a Leader and Outperformer in the 2025 GigaOm Radar for Vector Databases.
